name: Subsemiring.coe_nonneg
initialProofState:
R : Type u_2
inst✝ : OrderedSemiring R
⊢ Eq (↑(Subsemiring.nonneg R)) (Set.Ici 0)
decl:
/-- The set of nonnegative elements in an ordered semiring, as a subsemiring. -/
@[simps]
def nonneg (R : Type*) [OrderedSemiring R] : Subsemiring R where
  carrier := Set.Ici 0
  mul_mem' := mul_nonneg
  one_mem' := zero_le_one
  add_mem' := add_nonneg
  zero_mem' := le_rfl
